
# this training project is taken from the following FastAPI tutorial:
https://fastapi.tiangolo.com/learn/

# cheat cheat from mypy
https://mypy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/cheat_sheet_py3.html


# setup for virtual environment 
python -m venv env
source env/bin/activate
deactivate 
pip install -r requirements.txt

# start fastapi with uvicorn
uvicorn main:app --reload 

# http://127.0.0.1:8000              for accessing api 
# http://127.0.0.1:8000/docs         for accessing the swagger ui
# http://127.0.0.1:8000/redoc        for autogenerated documentation 
# http://127.0.0.1:8000/openapi.json for JSON model 


# pip compile: use infile to restore setup
